mapper.select: select rcrt_no, course_div, course_name, term_div, step_div, sel_cnt, status_div from entry_sel_master where term_div like #{termDiv} and course_div like #{courseDiv} and course_name like #{courseName} and (status_div=#{StatusPrepared} or status_div=#{StatusCompleted})

select c.aply_no, c.doc_pass_yn,c.name_kor,c.rcrt_no, d.ev_pdf_file_no, d.note, e.ev1_score, e.ev2_score, e.ev3_score, (e.ev1_score+ e.ev2_score + e.ev3_score) as total from entry_apply_master as c inner join entry_ev_target as d on c.aply_no = d.aply_no and c.rcrt_no = d.rcrt_no inner join sel_ev_score as e on e.aply_no = d.aply_no and e.rcrt_no = d.rcrt_no where c.rcrt_no=#{rcrtNo}
mapper.update: update entry_sel_master set status_div=#{StatusCompleted} where rcrt_no=#{rcrtNo}
update entry_sel_master set status_div=#{StatusPrepared} where rcrt_no=#{rcrtNo}
